raw: A senior Chinese official contacted European officials in Beijing the same day to tell them that , “ if the report is as described and it is released today it will be very bad for cooperation , ” according to EU diplomatic correspondence reviewed by Reuters .

raw: Disinformation about the coronavirus outbreak is emerging as a flashpoint between the United States and China , and officials on both sides have traded allegations of hiding information about the pandemic .
